name: Robots, Guns and Explosions
description:
Thanks for viewing this page.

If you enjoy the game please check out my steam-page  for other titles I made and leave a like here.

Art, music and coding were all made by me.

Please only download the game from the official steam-game-workshop and itch.io

____________

CONTROLS KEYBOARD:

W - JUMP
A - LEFT
D - RIGHT
SPACE - SHOOT

CONTROLS CONTROLLER:

MOVE - LEFT ANALOG STICK
JUMP - A
SHOOT - B
